abstract_summ: The covid-19 pandemic has encouraged more people to make advance treatment decisions relating to CPR and ventilation, reports Clare WilsonContrary to medical expectation, many people with covid-19 are still experiencing symptoms weeks or even months later.In this commentary, we highlight some of the pressing choices and sacrifices we must make in medical education during the COVID-19 pandemic.Linda Geddes investigates what's going on
title_summ: How we make choices and sacrifices in medical education during the COVID-19 pandemic.Crisis hits end-of-life careThe enduring grip of covid-19
